sections.heading: Rules of ordinary proceeding applicableExcept as otherwise provided in this Title and by law, the rules applicable to an ordinary proceeding apply, so far as practicable, to a concursus proceeding
sections.text: Rules of ordinary proceeding applicableExcept as otherwise provided in this Title and by law, the rules applicable to an ordinary proceeding apply, so far as practicable, to a concursus proceeding.
